location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: blueprintDimensions: 660 x 500mm, on sheet 710 x 540mm

mods.abstract: This blueprint map, showing Bahrain, Qatar, and surrounding areas, is part of the draft oil concession entitled 'The Leased Area. Bahrain', dated 1938, between Shaikh Sir Hamad bin Isa al Khalifah [Ḥamad bin ‘Īsá Āl Khalīfah], the Ruler of Bahrain, and Petroleum Concessions Limited (folios 189-208).The map states: 'Enlarged in Land Department. Government of Bahrain'.The Leased Area that is the subject of the agreement is shown outlined in red on the map.
